General.Name: in Style Group PLC
General.Description: Itsarm plc, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an e-commerce womenswear fashion brand in the United Kingdom, the rest of Europe, and internationally. It sells various fashion items through its e-commerce websites and proprietary In The Style app, as well as through digital retail wholesale partners. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Salford, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Olympic Court, Salford, United Kingdom, M50 2QP
